filter.aql: name matches anywhere ignore-case '$${Value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.place.of.interest:cataloging/name) starts with ignore-case '$${Value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.object.of.interest:description/description) contains ignore-case '$${Value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse:related-objects/object/@object-irn) starts with '$${Value}$$' or xpath(emu:record/irn) starts with '$${Value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse:related-objects/object/@registration-number) starts with '$${Value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.object.of.interest:cataloging/registration-number) starts with '$${Value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.object.of.interest:cataloging/registration-number) starts with '$${Value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.digital.asset:production/job-ids/id) starts with '$${Value}$$'
